articles.image_title: epa04674763 German Army General Hans-Lothar Domroese, Commander Allied Joint Force Command Brunssum, looks from a vehicle during a stay of the 'Dragoon Ride' military convoy in Riga, Latvia 22 March 2015. Military vehicles of the 3rd Squadron, 2nd Cavalry Regiment of the US Army mainly consisting of 'Stryker' armoured personell carriers passed through Riga as the convoy called 'Dragoon Ride' moves from the Tapa Military base in Estonia to its home base in Germany while collecting US soldiers from separate training locations in the Baltic states and Poland. The 'Dragoon Ride' will pass through Estonia, Lithuania, Poland, Latvia, the Czech Republic and will finally end at the regiment's home base at Rose Barracks in Vilseck, Germany. EPA/VALDA KALNINA ++ +++ dpa-Bildfunk +++

articles.image_title: In this image made from video released by the Russian Presidential Press Service, Russian President Vladimir Putin addressees the nation in Moscow, Russia, Thursday, Feb. 24, 2022. Russian troops launched their anticipated attack on Ukraine on Thursday, as Putin cast aside international condemnation and sanctions and warned other countries that any attempt to interfere would lead to "consequences you have never seen." (Russian Presidential Press Service via AP)

articles.image_title: Ob Krapfen Pfannkuchen oder Berliner: Schmalzgebackenes gehört zu Karneval einfach dazu. In den Kamps Backshops gibt es je nach Region Kirschberliner Berliner mit Vanille Pflaumenmus oder Himbeer Johannisbeer Füllung. Zur Karnevalszeit locken zusätzlich süße Füllungen wie Eierlikör Schokolade oder Ananaskonfitüre. Die Verwendung dieses Bildes ist für redaktionelle Zwecke honorarfrei. Abdruck bitte unter Quellenangabe: "obs/Kamps AG" Weiterer Text über ots und www.presseportal.de /
